metadata.title: CVE-2023-52795 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:vhost-vdpa: fix use after free in vhost_vdpa_probe()The put_device() calls vhost_vdpa_release_dev() which callsida_simple_remove() and frees "v".  So this call toida_simple_remove() is a use after free and a double free.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
